   <div class="feed feed-custom" data-aggregate-id="bd0667b8-ea4d-452d-8351-e687cc36afe2">
    <div class="feed-block-container block-style- block-layout-image-right">
     <div class="feed-block feed-block-big-story" data-block-template="big-story">
      <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="83e6f50b-8e19-4fcb-a784-b59a3bf5fff4" data-vars-block-slot="1" data-vars-block-type="Big Story Block">
       <div class="custom-item soledad-obrien-matter-of-fact-listening-tour-to-be-an-american image-right">
        <div class="custom-item-inner">
         <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Big Story 1" data-vars-position="1" href="/life/a35855849/soledad-obrien-matter-of-fact-listening-tour-to-be-an-american/">
          <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/broadcast-journalist-and-executive-producer-soledad-obrien-news-photo-1615833159.?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.167xw,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
          </span>
          <img alt="soledad o'brien" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/broadcast-journalist-and-executive-producer-soledad-obrien-news-photo-1615833159.?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.167xw,0&amp;resize=320:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/broadcast-journalist-and-executive-producer-soledad-obrien-news-photo-1615833159.?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.167xw,0&amp;resize=480:* 480w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/broadcast-journalist-and-executive-producer-soledad-obrien-news-photo-1615833159.?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.167xw,0&amp;resize=640:* 640w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/broadcast-journalist-and-executive-producer-soledad-obrien-news-photo-1615833159.?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.167xw,0&amp;resize=980:* 980w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/broadcast-journalist-and-executive-producer-soledad-obrien-news-photo-1615833159.?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.167xw,0&amp;resize=1024:* 1024w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/broadcast-journalist-and-executive-producer-soledad-obrien-news-photo-1615833159.?crop=0.668xw:1.00xh;0.167xw,0&amp;resize=1120:* 1120w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="AOL Build Presents: &quot;Soledad O'Brien Presents: The War Comes Home - The New Battlefront&quot;"/>
         </a>
         <div class="custom-item-content">
          <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Big Story 1" data-vars-position="1" href="/life/a35855849/soledad-obrien-matter-of-fact-listening-tour-to-be-an-american/">
           Soledad O’Brien’s “Matter of Fact Listening Tour” Continues With A Dissection Of American Identity
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
           <p>
            Watch “To Be An American: Identity, Race And Justice” here.
           </p>
          </div>
          <span class="custom-item-meta">
          </span>
         </div>

       <div class="custom-item-no-image custom-item racial-bias-pain-assessment-management no-image">
        <div class="custom-item-inner">
         <div class="custom-item-content">
          <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Big Story 8" data-vars-position="1" href="/health/a35483492/racial-bias-pain-assessment-management/">
           Two Women Got Wildly Different Amounts Of Pain Meds—Only Skin Color Determined The Difference
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
           <p>
            Black people have long had their pain underestimated.
           </p>

       <div class="custom-item water-bottle-recycled-leggings text-under">

       </h2>

      </svg>
     </a>
    </div>

	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/womenshealth/assets/css/homepage.cbe9a00.css"],
		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/womenshealth/assets/css/homepage-mobile.368ddb2.css"];

		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( document, Modernizr );
